name: Excelle Consulting Private Limited
description: Excelle Consulting was incorporated in January 2003, at a time when the lackluster global economy presented great challenges for both large and small enterprises. To enhance their competitive edge, many enterprises saw the need to restructure themselves, revamp their operations and acquire key 21st Century competencies. To provide outstanding client services in business and IT consulting, project management, training and coaching where Excelle Consulting has developed deep expertise and experience.
features: Selection and Evaluation of Business Software Solutions
Change Management and Communication Plan Development
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Your preferred partner to help you manage, deliver and differentiate through consulting, executive training & coaching services
ShortDescription: Excelle Consulting was incorporated in January 2003, at a time when the lackluster global economy presented great challenges for both large and small enterprises.
enhanced_description: Excelle Consulting, incorporated in January 2003, is a firm that provides consulting services to both large and small enterprises facing global economic challenges. Their core mission is to help organizations enhance their competitive edge by restructuring, revamping operations, and acquiring key 21st Century competencies. Excelle Consulting offers a range of outstanding client services including business and IT consulting, project management, and specialized training and coaching, where they have developed deep expertise. They position themselves as a preferred partner for managing, delivering, and differentiating through their comprehensive consulting, executive training, and coaching services, with a focus on specific features like the selection and evaluation of business software solutions, change management and communication plan development, and balanced scorecard and performance management. Their services aim to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency for their clients.
key_use_cases: Selection and evaluation of business software solutions
Development of change management and communication plans
Implementation and optimization of balanced scorecard and performance management systems
competitive_advantages: Deep expertise and experience in business and IT consulting, project management, training, and coaching
Commitment to providing outstanding client services
roi_benefits: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
